tool_description: This API allows users to access and manage a collection of books in a bookstore.
name: Bookstore API
title: Bookstore API

api_list.name: FindBooks
api_list.description: Retrieves a list of all books in the bookstore.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://bookstore-api.p.rapidapi.com/books"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bookstore-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://bookstore-api.p.rapidapi.com/books"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bookstore-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
